title: How does the new Pixel 5 compare with the Pixel 4A 5G and Pixel 4a? - Quora

response.answer_text: announced the Pixel 5’s launch with the Pixel 4a earlier this year. At the Launch Night In virtual event tonight, Google unveiled its flagship phone to the world. The much-awaited Google Pixel 5 tried to appeal to the customers by lowering the price of the smartphone. They achieved this by replacing the Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 series processor with a 700 series processor. The smartphone with a clean android experience starts at a price of $699. Let’s take a look at the comparison between the California tech giant’s flagship phone and the mid-range phone. By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | Updated: October 1, 2020 8:42:25 am Google Pixel 5 is water-resistant (Source: Google) Google announced the Pixel 5’s launch with the Pixel 4a earlier this year. At the Launch Night In virtual event tonight, Google unveiled its flagship phone to the world. The much-awaited Google Pixel 5 tried to appeal to the customers by lowering the price of the smartphone. They achieved this by replacing the Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 series processor with a 700 series processor. The smartphone with a clean android experience starts at a price of $699. Obviously better. But not coming to India. Otherwise I like the idea of 765G, instead of top of the line SoC. Because 90% of people never needed so powerful processor.Even 730G is enough for most task. Customized battery saver option is good and should be in every smartphone.But charging is just 18W, very slow when we compare to other brandsThe main camera is of 12 MP , But i am very sure it can beat a lot of PHONEY FLAGSHIPS To shame, because Google's software for processing images is wonderful.
